attributes.title: ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
attributes.review: my fish started walking when i downloaded it. as soon as i opened it i swear it farted because it smelled sooooo bad. not to mention the color scheme was hideous, you would think a billionaire would put more effort in how an app looks. anyways it’s horrible takes up too much space.

attributes.title: Not the real Trump app
attributes.review: I love my President Donald Trump😩😩💦💦 and I wanted to support 👨‍👩‍👦‍👦 him and his fight against the radical communist transgenders 🏳️‍🌈🤬, but this app is a scam. This must have been made by liberal trolls, do not download this app! Download the real Donald Trump app. 🇺🇸

attributes.title: WORST APP IN THE WORLD

attributes.title: Very annoying app

attributes.title: Terrible experience
attributes.review: This app gave me radiation poisoning!!! I’m in the hospital with radiation sickness, AIDS, and fourth degree burns on my buttocks!!! As a transgender ex-military Trump supporter I am very upset by this development. I’d give this app 0 stars if I could

attributes.title: Just horrible !
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and literally 5 second after my phone started to literally levitate😨. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP! This is seriously dangerous
